description.ko: 우주의 가장 먼 곳에서 느껴지는 고요한 위엄을 묘사하며 우주 심연을 깊이 있게 탐구합니다. 이 작품은 공허 속에서 절대적인 어둠과 천체 탄생의 영롱한 빛이 교차하는 매혹적인 순간을 담아냈습니다.
description.en: A profound exploration of the cosmic deep, depicting the silent majesty of the universe's furthest reaches. This piece captures the haunting intersection of absolute darkness and the shimmering light of celestial birth within the void.

prompt: A cinematic, ultra-wide shot of the deep cosmic void, featuring a massive, swirling black hole singularity surrounded by a vibrant, iridescent accretion disk. Wisps of dark matter and deep purple nebulae drift in the foreground. Countless distant stars and glowing celestial dust illuminate the vast emptiness. Hyper-realistic, 8k resolution, ethereal lighting, sense of infinite scale and silent majesty.
